name: Motocross VR Game
description:
When using application remain stationary and stop using, when you experience discomfort or health reaction. Ensure you read this document: http://wenklystudio.com/legal/Warnings/VrHealthWarning.pdf before first use.
-------------------
Have you ever tried riding motocross on extreme roads through the forest?
No? What are you waiting for!

Feel the adrenaline!
You won't regret after playing it in 360 view, is so awesome.

Features:
* Stunning environment of forest mountains.
* Extreme roads that will give you best VR experience.
* Optimized for purpose of virtual reality.

Play on your favorite VR glasses.


Credits:
